metadata.title: CVE-2017-12904 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command inbookmarking function of Newsbeuter versions 0.7 through 2.9 allows remoteattackers to perform user-assisted code execution by crafting an RSS itemthat includes shell code in its title and/or URL.

criterions.comment: newsbeuter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
